amendment.description: Amendment gave priority to applications from companies located in areas that have lost a major source of employment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 110-603 to give priority to applications from companies located in areas that have lost a major source of employment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boswell amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Boswell.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boswell amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
